docs.lead_paragraph: North Carolina's Democratic attorney general said on Friday he would appeal a federal court ruling that struck down a Republican-backed state law requiring abortion providers to conduct an ultrasound and explain it to a woman before an abortion.

headline.main: North Carolina Attorney General to Appeal Abortion Ultrasound Ruling
headline.print_headline: North Carolina Attorney General to Appeal Abortion Ultrasound Ruling

docs.snippet: North Carolina's Democratic attorney general said on Friday he would appeal a federal court ruling that struck down a Republican-backed state law requiring abortion providers to conduct an ultrasound and explain it to a woman before an abortion.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Colorado woman who police believe faked a pregnancy was charged on Friday with the kidnapping in Wisconsin of her 6-day-old nephew, who was found a day later behind a gas station in Iowa, federal prosecutors said.

headline.main: Wisconsin Baby's Aunt Charged in Kidnap of 6-Day-Old Nephew
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Baby's Aunt Charged in Kidnap of 6-Day-Old Nephew

docs.snippet: A Colorado woman who police believe faked a pregnancy was charged on Friday with the kidnapping in Wisconsin of her 6-day-old nephew, who was found a day later behind a gas station in Iowa, federal prosecutors said.

docs.lead_paragraph: AOL Inc Chief Executive Tim Armstrong tried to tamp down a backlash after he blamed a pension cut on costs stemming from two employees' "distressed babies," insisting that the Internet provider was focused on families.

headline.main: Backlash Hits AOL CEO After 'Distressed Babies' Remark
headline.print_headline: Backlash Hits AOL CEO After 'Distressed Babies' Remark

docs.snippet: AOL Inc Chief Executive Tim Armstrong tried to tamp down a backlash after he blamed a pension cut on costs stemming from two employees' "distressed babies," insisting that the Internet provider was focused on families.

docs.lead_paragraph: North Carolina's attorney general said Friday he's decided to appeal a federal court ruling that struck down part of a law requiring abortion providers to describe an ultrasound to women seeking to terminate a pregnancy.

headline.main: NC AG to Appeal Ruling on Part of Abortion Law
headline.print_headline: NC AG to Appeal Ruling on Part of Abortion Law

docs.snippet: North Carolina's attorney general said Friday he's decided to appeal a federal court ruling that struck down part of a law requiring abortion providers to describe an ultrasound to women seeking to terminate a pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Colorado woman police believe faked a pregnancy was charged on Friday with the kidnapping in Wisconsin of her 6-day-old nephew, who was found a day later behind a gas station in Iowa, federal prosecutors said.

headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Baby's Aunt Charged in Kidnap of Six-Day-Old Nephew

docs.abstract: The latest monthly collection of stories about young people published in The Times.
docs.snippet: The latest monthly collection of stories about young people published in The Times.

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who pretended to be pregnant stole her half-sister's newborn boy from a Wisconsin home and left him in a storage crate outside an Iowa gas station in frigid temperatures as police closed in, according to court documents filed Friday.

headline.main: Woman Charged With Kidnapping Baby Found in Iowa
headline.print_headline: Woman Charged With Kidnapping Baby Found in Iowa

docs.snippet: A woman who pretended to be pregnant stole her half-sister's newborn boy from a Wisconsin home and left him in a storage crate outside an Iowa gas station in frigid temperatures as police closed in, according to court documents filed Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The family of Robyn Benson, who sustained a fatal brain hemorrhage, hopes her fetus will mature enough to be delivered.

headline.main: Brain-Dead, a Canadian Woman Remains a Silent Partner Awaiting Birth
headline.print_headline: Brain-Dead, a Canadian Woman Remains a Silent Partner Awaiting Birth

docs.abstract: Pregnant Canadian woman Robyn Benson remains on life support nearly six weeks after she was declared brain-dead due to her family's hope that her fetus will mature enough to be delivered; Benson's situation differs significantly from case of Marlise Munoz, Texas woman whose family successfully sought court order to end life support, because Benson's husband agrees with family and fetus remains healthy and growing.
docs.snippet: The family of Robyn Benson, who sustained a fatal brain hemorrhage, hopes her fetus will mature enough to be delivered.

byline.contributor: Denise Grady contributed reporting from New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: A guide to movies playing at theaters in the New York City area, as well as select film series.
docs.snippet: A guide to movies playing at theaters in the New York City area, as well as select film series.

docs.lead_paragraph: The media company said it benefited by selling video advertising on the web globally, with 23 percent growth in that revenue.

headline.main: AOL Reports Solid Revenue, but Patch Weighs on Profit
headline.print_headline: AOL Reports Solid Revenue, but Patch Weighs on Profit

docs.abstract: AOL reports fourth-quarter net income of $92 million, down 92 percent from just over $1 billion in year-earlier period, amid costs related to struggling news service Patch; notes total revenue grew by 13 percent to $679 million, fueled by robust growth in advertising.
docs.snippet: The media company said it benefited by selling video advertising on the web globally, with 23 percent growth in that revenue.
